data.job_title: Front-end and Mobile Developers’ (iOS / Android) | Kuala Lumpur, MY
data.job_description:
Please note there are several positions – so from junior to senior developers from 2+ years’ experience onwards.

Title: Front-end and Mobile Developers’ (iOS / Android)

Location: KL, Malaysia

Job description

Our prestigious client, a leading FinTech Group, is building an international operation/ tech Centre in Malaysia to support their global cross-border payment, digital payment, and digital services expansion.

Our client is open to firing over 10+ headcounts for front-end developers and mobile developers (iOS / Android- Mandarin Chinese speakers most welcome!).

It's a unique opportunity to join a fast-expanding top-tier technology company and enjoy abundant learning and growing experience.

Key Responsibilities:
• Senior developers will help build and manage the Malaysian development team.
• Develop and design mobile applications and platform SDKs
• Working closely with other departments and global strategic partners to build products with excellent user experience.
• Research on new technologies.

Qualifications:
• Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, a related field, or equivalent practical experience.
• Strong proficiency in native mobile development languages, i.e. Swift or Objective-C or Kotlin or Java; with a deep understanding of performance optimization, networking protocols, and memory management.
• Solid software engineering background and practical ability in implementing or applying data structures, algorithms, and design patterns in software development.
• Strong communication in English, and collaboration skills to work effectively within a team environment.
• Fluency in Mandarin Chinese is a plus. English is a pre-requisite
• Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills, with the ability to apply critical thinking to resolve complex technical challenges.

Preferred Qualifications:
• Projects and Team Management experience of managing cross border development teams is a distinct plus.

Please contact our IT/ Tech search team for Southeast Asia / Malaysia: Cora Pan – cv (@) harbridgepartners(.)com

Harbridge Partners Limited

Employment Agency License: 75427

Company Information

Business Nature: Gaming Development

Working arrangement: Hybrid / Remotely (Can be discussed during interview)

Position available: 3 (Junior, Mid, Senior)

Job Summary

As a Frontend Game Developer, you will play a vital role in designing and implementing captivating frontend components using the Cocos Creator framework. Your work will contribute to creating immersive and visually appealing gaming experiences for our players. You'll collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement features, troubleshoot issues, and ensure optimal performance. Writing clean, efficient code and staying updated on industry trends are key aspects of this role.

Responsibilities
• Collaborate with game designers, artists, and backend developers to translate game concepts and requirements into interactive frontend experiences using Cocos Creator.
• Implement UI/UX designs, ensuring intuitive and visually stunning user interfaces, menus, and heads-up displays (HUDs).
• Write clean, efficient, and modular code in TypeScript/JavaScript, leveraging the Cocos Creator API and tools to create reusable and maintainable game components.
• Optimize frontend performance by identifying and resolving bottlenecks, implementing efficient rendering techniques, and improving memory management.
• Stay up to date with the latest advancements in front-end game development, game engine features, and industry trends.

Requirements
• Bachelor’s degree in computer science / game development or equivalent related fields.
• 1 - 5 years of professional experience in game development, with a focus on gameplay development
• Proficiency in Cocos Creator / Unity / Phaser engine.
• Proficiency in programming languages like Typescript, JavaScript etc.
• Solid understanding of game design principles, gameplay mechanics, physics, animation, and asset management.
• Solid understanding of RESTful web services and APIs
• Able to pick up and adapt to new technology quickly.
• Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to optimize game performance and address performance bottlenecks.
• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
• Passion for gaming, with a deep interest in staying updated with the latest trends and advancements in the game development industry.

Job Description

Responsibilities:
• Develop front-end application features using HTML 5 / CSS 3 / JavaScript / TypeScript.
• Build reusable code and libraries for various projects
• Develop, test, debug, tune and improve frontend application robustness, performance and reliability.
• Interact with subject matter experts (functional & UI/UX) to understand business requirements and UI/UX of the applications accordingly
• Ensure timely completion of tasks assigned / delegated

Requirements:
• Degree in Computer Sciences / Software Engineering / Information Technology or equivalent
• At least 1 year of working experience in HTML5, CSS3, Javascript and TypeScript especially ReactJS
• Experience in iOS/Android development is a plus, but not required
• Experience in building front-end NPM-based development workflow with CSS pre-processor such as SASS, Transpiler, Webpack
• Experience with code versioning tools such as Git and SVN
• Individual that is optimistic, proactive, good initiative, passionate, and strives to achieve more as a team
• Experience to integrate the front-end application to back end API
• Experience to integrate the front-end application with Cordova framework/plugin
• Ability to cope with tight deadlines and adhere to the delivery plan
• Ability and willingness to travel within the region
• Willing to explore back-end technology such as JAVA/.NET, but not required

Roles and Responsibilities :

1. Develops server-side logic and APIs.

2. Manages databases and server infrastructure.

3. Ensures data security, integrity, and scalability

4. Implements efficient algorithms and optimizing database queries to optimize app performance

5. Design the system architecture to handle varying user loads.

6. Identify and fix these issues to prevent user frustration

Requirement:

Language : C#, SQL

Tools : ASP.NET, Microsoft Azure

Job Types: Full-time, Permanent

Pay: RM3,500.00 - RM4,000.00 per month

Schedule:
• Monday to Friday

Supplemental Pay:
• Performance bonus
• Yearly bonus

data.job_description:
-Turn requirements such as wireframes, prototypes and interactive user interfaces into fully functional and highly performing responsive websites
-Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs
-Optimizing web pages for maximum speed and scalability
-Work collaboratively with other engineers, UX designers and Product Manager to drive high-quality, on-time deliverables
-Providing technical expertise and peer code reviews to other team members
-Assist in leading, guiding and mentoring of junior developers

[Apply now at https://my.hiredly.com/jobs/jobs-malaysia-hiredly-x-job-senior-front-end-engineer]

We are seeking an experienced Front-End Developer to join our team. This position is fully remote.

Salary: USD 750-900 per month DOE.

As a Front-End Developer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining the user interface of our and our client's websites. The ideal candidate should be able to work independently, manage their time efficiently, and communicate effectively with the team.

Requirements:
Minimum of 2-3 years of experience as a Front-End Developer A degree in a related field Advanced in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, and responsive design Advanced in responsive frameworks such as Tailwind CSS or Bootstrap Experience with Git, version control, and Agile development methodologies Experience in HubSpot is a huge plus Proficiency in UI/UX designs (Figma) Knowledge of other JavaScript frameworks (such as React, Vue.js, or Angular) is appreciated. Fast internet and STABLE electricity are mandatory. Capable computer.

Qualifications:
Honest and sincere Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail Ability to write clean, maintainable, and efficient code Excellent communication skills and ability to work collaboratively in a team environment Self-motivated and able to work independently Familiarity with UX/UI design principles Ability to prioritize and manage multiple tasks and projects A fast self-learner

If you meet the above requirements and qualifications and are interested in this opportunity, please submit your resume, a cover letter outlining your experience and skills, and an online portfolio to showcase your best work.

SUBMISSIONS WITHOUT A COVER LETTER, RESUME, AND PORTFOLIO WILL BE IGNORED.

Company Description

BlueTech is a creative agency that delivers a comprehensive range of services from web development, web design, web maintanence, to online branding .

We utilise the most advanced development techniques to provide a wide range of services at reasonable prices.

Let us know your business objectives, we will work to achieve the best business outcomes for you.

Job Description

Job Duties:

· Implement 3rd party API software program into websites.

· Connect to RESTFUL API's through server side or with Javascript

· Write to and from a web orientated database (SQL, Mongo, etc…)

· Liaise closely with front-end web developer and account manager for the delivery of projects.

· Enthusiastically seeking feedback and training to continue to improve and develop skills.

· Possess analytical thought process with ability to breakdown requirements into functional solutions.

· Stay up-to-date on emerging technologies All your infor

Qualifications

Requirements:
• Candidate must possess at least a Professional Certificate, Diploma, Advanced/Higher/Graduate Diploma, Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science/Information Technology, Engineering (Computer) or equivalent.
• Required language(s): English, Chinese
• Fresh Grad or with at least 1 year of working experience in the related field.
• Passion for the best design and coding practices and a desire to develop new bold ideas
• Candidate must be willing to work in Cheras, Kuala Lumpur.

Additional Information

Skills:
• Demonstrate knowledge of PHP and 3rd Party API integrations.
• Experience in connecting to RESTFUL API's through server side or with Javascript
• Experience in creating user sessions, login, logout, etc…
• Basic knowledge of LAMP or WAMP architecture
• Basic knowledge of writing to and from a web orientated database (SQL, Mongo, etc…)
• Knowledge of writing basic server side applications (PHP, Node, Ruby, Python), with PHP or Node preferred

· Knowledge of Javascript front-end frameworks such as jQuery, and Ajax libraries
• Coding logics and analytic ability.

data.employer_name: E solutions It Services Private Limited
data.job_description: Contract 12 months location malaysia kl onsite role work from office min 2 years exp junior mandatory shell scripting unix scripting good to have

Key Responsibilities: WordPress Website Development : Develop and customize WordPress themes and plugins based on design and functionality requirements.
Build websites from scratch using WordPress, ensuring high performance, security, and responsiveness across all devices.
Implement page layouts, templates, and features according to the design teams specifications.
Website Maintenance and Troubleshooting : Perform regular website maintenance, updates, and backups.
Troubleshoot and resolve website issues (e.g., bugs, broken links, downtime) to ensure the smooth functioning of the website.
Update WordPress core, themes, and plugins to maintain website security and performance.
Front-End Development : Write clean, well-documented code using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript to create interactive and dynamic user interfaces.
Ensure website compatibility across multiple platforms (desktop, mobile, tablet) and browsers.
Collaborate with the design team to convert wireframes and design mockups into functional websites.
Back-End Development : Develop custom post types, taxonomies, and custom fields to enhance the functionality of WordPress websites.
Optimize database performance and ensure smooth integration between the front-end and back-end of the website.
Implement third-party APIs and tools as needed for website functionalities such as forms, analytics, or e-commerce.
Search Engine Optimization (SEO) and Performance Optimization : Optimize websites for performance (load times, speed) and ensure they are SEO-friendly.
Use tools such as Google PageSpeed Insights, GTMetrix, or Pingdom to monitor and improve site performance.
Implement SEO best practices including schema markup, keyword integration, and site structure optimization.
E-commerce Development (if applicable) : Develop and maintain WordPress e-commerce sites using WooCommerce or other e-commerce plugins.
Set up product pages, checkout processes, payment gateways, and shipping methods.
Troubleshoot issues related to the e-commerce functionality and ensure smooth transactions.
Security and Compliance : Implement security best practices for WordPress websites (e.g., SSL certificates, secure logins, malware scans).
Monitor the website for vulnerabilities and ensure proper security measures are in place to prevent hacking and data breaches.
Ensure compliance with data protection regulations (e.g., GDPR) when handling user data.
Collaboration and Communication : Collaborate with cross-functional teams (designers, marketers, content creators) to understand project requirements and deliver high-quality solutions.
Clearly communicate progress, timelines, and any issues to stakeholders.
Provide technical support and training to clients or team members on WordPress functionalities.
Requirements : Educational Background : Degree or diploma in Web Development, Computer Science, Information Technology, or related fields is preferred, though not always required if experienced.
Experience : Proven work experience as a WordPress Developer (typically 1-3 years or more).
Experience in developing custom WordPress themes and plugins is highly desirable.
Technical Skills : Proficiency in HTML5 , CSS3 , JavaScript , and PHP (core languages for WordPress development).
Experience with MySQL databases and ability to write custom queries.
Strong knowledge of WordPress architecture, theme hierarchies, hooks, and filters.
Familiarity with modern front-end frameworks (e.g., Bootstrap, Tailwind) and JavaScript libraries (e.g., jQuery, React).
Understanding of version control tools like Git .
Experience with WooCommerce for e-commerce site development (optional but preferred).
Additional Skills : Basic understanding of UX/UI principles and responsive design.
Knowledge of page builders (e.g., Elementor, WPBakery) and WordPress frameworks (e.g., Genesis, Divi).
Familiarity with hosting environments, including cPanel , FTP , and DNS management.
Proficiency in performance optimization and website testing tools (e.g., Google Lighthouse, GTMetrix).
Soft Skills : Problem-solving mindset with attention to detail.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Excellent communication skills to collaborate with both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Time management and the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.
Working Conditions : Remote / WFH setting Some flexibility in working hours may be required when troubleshooting urgent website issues.
